title: Is the Florida Mass Shooter a Member of a White Supremacist Group?
subtitle: There is no evidence to date that the confessed school shooter belongs to any organized hate group, although he reportedly expressed white supremacist views online.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Nikolas Cruz, the confessed gunman in the February 2018 school shooting in Parkland, Florida, is or was a member of a known white supremacist or white nationalist organization.
